about_the_game:
관문고 : Gwan Moon High School
The high school built on the gateway receiving signs from the spirit world; Spirits get stronger with the dark moon.

To see if the ghost stories of the school are true, to get the stuff back they left at school... High school students go to school in the middle of the night for their own reasons and start to panic when they see ghosts. They are not able to find friends who went there together, and also unable to leave school. The students try to disclose the truth of the ghost story with few clues...


  • Horror Visual Novel Game with Point & Click Adventure system.
  • The main episodes are 2 flows in parallel.
  • The side episodes for looking at characters' past.
  • After Stories of Characters, Character Information and so on.
  • Play time : About 7 hours.

You can play the beginning of the story about 1 hour (6 chapters) in demo version.

fullgame.name: Gwan Moon High School : The Ghost Gate

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core or higher.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core or higher.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Gwan Moon High School Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core or higher.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: High school students go to school with their own reasons late at night with an ominous feeling. After midnight... the fears deep inside become reality.
